item.description:
Come have a great time with your fellow NHC-ers for a good cause.

Help stuff backpacks for the Children's' Crisis Center after work! The Center needs help packing backpacks with school supplies for their "Back to School" party. Pizza will be provided.

The center is located on Dwight St in a great antique house (there's even servant's quarters in the basement!). They have a full parking lot in the back, so parking isn't a
problem.

The backpacks that are stuffed at the Pizza Party will be handed out to the kids on Thursday, August 23rd at the 'Back to School' Party. If you have a free hour or two on that day and would like to participate, Click here to sign up.

Here's a link to the centers website for more information on the
organization: http://www.ccccnh.org...

Contact:
Devorah at (203) 314-4329
item.name: Pizza! and Pencil Sharpeners!
